title: @Riot would you ever consider expanding a seasonal skin?
body: Take Wukong's Radiant skin, one of my personal favorite in looks, color schemes, and overall. But it's a Lunar reveal skin and I was wondering if we could get more or would it have to be a lunar skin regardlessly? Like Radiant WW would be a good skin and an insta buy for me.

replies.body: Because we know we'll be doing them every year, if we do have a strong candidate in mind we work on it when that patch rolls around.
Yeah we done goofed on the [t-shirt](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/clothing/shirts/2017-zodiac-tee.html) imo. Should have been Soraka. Soraka GOAT.

well we did get yade fang Cassio in the year of the snake and warring kingdoms azir in the year of the rooster,so its not uncommon for them to give us zodiac related skin.
Though sadly they skipped Hecarim during the year of the horse :(
Goat is sometimes associated with satan so {{champion:17}}  could be a strong candidate for that

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aJe6zPEV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-11T19:27:45.977+0000)
>
> Because we know we'll be doing them every year, if we do have a strong candidate in mind we work on it when that patch rolls around.

I see. If I send you a nutella cake from a world award winning bakery in my hometown, would that help you keep in mind a few candidates? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
No but that sounds incredible and you should be proud.
Theyvrelease new seasonal skins every year wk was vi garen and azir next yeartheyll release more.  And ww has enough skins as is.
